sentence.Network_en: The sight of the policeman made the murderer all of a dither.
sentence.Network_cn: 一见到警察,那个谋杀者吓得浑身发抖.

sentence.Network_en: There are valve dither and valve set point circuit to improve the performance of the system.
sentence.Network_cn: 为改善伺服阀的特性,在系统各通道的伺服输出电路中增加了可程控的阀偏置和阀颤振电路.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 艺术字体转换器在线生成印章字体字体图片 ... Distributor 布墨辊 Dither 发抖 Dithering 发抖.
颤动(dither)指有意添加在音频信号上用于改善低电平下数字信号的解析力的少量噪声。时基误差(jitter)指数字音响系统中用作同步的时 …
可以选勾仿色（Dither）选项以增加渐变的平滑。实验下来，效果不是很明显。
系统性能可以通过后处理和实时技术进一步增强,比如积分非线性(INL)校正和使用高频振动(Dither)改善SFDR。 INL曲线形状对ADC的谐波性能有很大的影响。通过表征这个INL.

list.abs: ps中渐变叠加技巧使用--... ... Pattern Dither（ 图象抖动）： Diffusion Dither（ 扩散抖动）： Halftone Screen（ 半色泽屏幕）：.
ps中渐变叠加技巧使用---神奇颜色 -... ... Method（ 方式）： Pattern Dither（ 图象抖动）： Diffusion Dither（ 扩散抖动）：.
Wald的意思中文翻译 ... dithered [计] 颤动的 dithered color 抖动色 dithering 抖动.
...n't sway back and forth)、不踌躇(no dithering)，还有翻译成“没有重大变化”(no major changes)的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the dialect sense 'tremble, quiver'): variant of dialect didder; related to dodder

entry.def: When someone dithers, they hesitate because they are unable to make a quick decision about something.

example.ex: We're still dithering over whether to marry...
example.tran: 我们仍在犹豫要不要结婚。

example.ex: If you have been dithering about buying shares, now could be the time to do it.
example.tran: 如果你一直在犹豫是否要买股票，现在或许是买的时候了。

sentences.sentence: "there was a terrible flap about the theft"

means.word_mean: 1. act nervously; be undecided; be uncertain

auth_sentence.content: While we dither they develop their nuclear technology.
auth_sentence.res_content: While we dither they develop their nuclear technology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While we dither they develop their nuclear technology.

auth_sentence.content: The PM said he wanted to "cut through the dither" that holds Britain back.
auth_sentence.res_content: The PM said he wanted to "cut through the dither" that holds Britain back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The PM said he wanted to "cut through the dither" that holds Britain back.

auth_sentence.content: Why not end the uncertainty, the "dither", and call a plebiscite now, on their own terms?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why not end the uncertainty, the "dither", and call a plebiscite now, on their own terms?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why not end the uncertainty, the "dither", and call a plebiscite now, on their own terms?

means.word_mean: (因不知所措)慌张, 犹豫不定

sentences.en: For God’s sake stop dithering and make up your mind!
sentences.cn: 看在上帝面上, 别再犹豫了, 快拿定主意吧！

means.word_mean: 犹豫不定, 不知所措
